name: Emergency (itch) (Ellisjames20061)
description:
There is an emergency there is a bug in the robots code and they have turned deadly.  You have been sent in to terminate al of the corrupted robots. Are you brave enough to do it?

This game was made in under a week for the make-a-level jam and the theme was emergency. I incorporated the theme with the emergency being a bug has made the robots lethal. The only limitation for the jam was that the game can only contain one level.

The game provides  a short, polished and fun experience.

Credits

Download the siren sound effect.
